features: BEST PROTECTION＆ANTI SCRATCH - Place our felt furniture pads on the legs of your furniture, including beds, tables, chairs, sofas and appliances to provide the best protection for your wood, laminate or tile floor. And you never have to hear that annoying scraping noise again.

LARGE VARIETY PACK - Our 182pcs Pack with a box contains felt furniture pads of the 8 sizes, round shape: (24)3/4’’, (40)1", (48)1.5" square shape: (48)1"x1", (8)0.9x1.4", (12)6"x1/2", (2)4"x6". These various size felt pads are fit for all your furniture and you can store rest floor protectors for furniture legs.

EXTRA-STRONG ADHESIVE - We professionally designed and produce self-stick felt pads for chair legs and other furniture. Yelanon anti scratch furniture pads made of high-density felt that keeps the felt furniture pads in place firmly and last longer.

NO TOOLS NECESSARY - Self Stick floor protectors for furniture legs can quickly be applied at the first sign of friction with the floor or table top. Please clean up chair legs and other furniture feet before stick felt pads for best effect.

YELANON IS A REGISTERED TRADEMARK - We take pride in providing the highest quality and most durable Felt Furniture Pads on the market . We are happy to guarantee our product. and friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SAVE MONEY AND ENERGY YOU SPEND TO PROTECT THESE WITH OUR FURNITURE FELT PADS. Felt pads for furniture on hardwood floors Yelanon do protect the furniture you loved from scratches and scuffs in your lovely home.

7 Most Useful Sizes & Shapes 2 Different Colors What do YELANON FURNITURE PADS do for you home? DIVERSITY SIZES - Best protection for Your wooden, laminate or tiled floors and suitable for all types of furniture.HIGH QUALITY FELT - Self Stick fibers eco materials, floor protectors for furniture legs.EXTRA STRONG ADHESIVE - The chair leg floor protectors have tenacious adhesive which tightly holds pads on the bottom of furniture for a long time.ANTI SCRATCH - Prevent your surfaces from getting scratches, nicks, and dents while reducing noise and eliminating vibrations with our thick Heavy Duty Felt Pad.
Most Used Different Sizes LARGE - cut out the shape and size you need MEDIUMd - for table legs/ heavy furniture/ couch feet. SMALL - for chair & arm-chair legs/ small items.

Please clean up furniture leg surface before stick felt pads for best effect. Cut the pads into size if you needed. Our felt furniture pads & protectors have the tenacious adhesive which tightly holds pads on the furniture for a long period of time. Anti Scratch Felt Pads Protectors for Chair Legs Feet, Protect Hardwood Tile Wood Floors & Laminate Flooring

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They get the job done!
reviews.reviewText: We bought these after getting our floors replaced. They work great! They are easy to put on and have different sizes and they do a great job of keeping your floors safe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of sizes, good quality
reviews.reviewText: New house, new floors. These go on everything. Stick well and protect the floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We got these to use for our headboard to protect it against the wall. These work great! The adhesive is extremely sticky and stuck well to the wood. I only gave it 4 stars because on some of the longer strip pieces it was a little hard to pull off the sticker backing paper on the back, but it still didn’t affect the product at all! It was the perfect size I needed. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Protect your floors
reviews.reviewText: Don't move one more piece of furniture on your wood floor without having these little gems. We just moved into a new home with wood floors. I'd been warned to put these on the furniture immediately, and it was great advice. A lot of sizes, easy to do, just stick them on the feet of the furniture, and save lots of dollars in floor repair - plus everything is easier to move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lot more than I needed
reviews.reviewText: The price was great and stopped the furniture from sliding immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to protect my floor when I moved into a new apartment. These work well on the tile and wood floors. They were easy to install, and there are enough sizes to choose from to find one that fits the furniture foot. I would definitely buy these again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Effective, But Pricey for What You Get
reviews.reviewText: I recently got the "Felt Furniture Pads Self Adhesive" to protect my luxury vinyl plank (LVP) floors from scratches caused by furniture movement. While these pads do the job to some extent, I have mixed feelings about them.Pros:Effective Protection: These felt furniture pads do provide some protection to my LVP floors. They effectively prevent scratches and scuffs that can occur when moving furniture. Theadhesive feature makes them easy to apply to the furniture legs, ensuring they stay in place and do their job.Cons:Thickness: My main concern with these pads is their thickness. They are thin, which might compromise their long-term durability and effectiveness. I wish they were bit more thicker for better cushioning and protection.Price: At $11 for what seems like a small quantity, I found these pads to be quite expensive for what you get. I remember seeing similar products with 50 pieces at the dollar store before the pandemic, which makes this purchase feel like a big splurge.In conclusion, the "Felt Furniture Pads Self Adhesive" do their job in protecting LVP floors from scratches caused by furniture. However, the thinness of the pads and their relatively high price point are notable drawbacks. While they are effective, I can't help but wish for a more cost-effective and thicker alternative, especially considering what was available before the pandemic. If you're in dire need of floor protection, these pads will work, but you might want to explore more budget-friendly options if you have a large furniture collection to outfit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Simple felt to protect floor/walls.They can be cut to fit other sizes.I've used them on chairs on wooden floor and cut some of the pieces to be thinner, sticking them on the back of benches and hallway tables to protect the drywall.The adhesion is medium not super sticky.May come off with time, but it's better than peeling off the finish of my furniture if I need to take them off.
Sehr gute Qualität , es lässt sich gut mit arbeiten gerne wieder

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Very sticky pads and well padded
reviews.reviewText: I have just had a new Luvanto floor put down which is a luxury vinyl type floor that comes in little planks.The dining table chairs made an awful noise when slid out and I was also concerned they would mark the White Oak floor.These pads have worked excellently. The pads have a very strong adhesive so be sure you have them in the correct position before pushing them in position.You can peel them off but you may need to discard that pad afterwards. But there are plenty on pads of various sizes to choose from and they can always be cut to size if necessary.The chairs now slide soundlessly and smoothly when moved.Very pleased with them.
Die Filzgleiter sind gut, sie kleben gut an den Möbeln, diese lassen sich anschließend deutlich leichter verschieben. Über die Langlebigkeit kann ich noch keine Angaben machen.
The package is opened for who knows if anyone stuffed in or out any packs! Worst.
